thread.title: Look what's keeping Ravi Bhatia busy these days!
thread.title_full: Look what's keeping Ravi Bhatia busy these days! - The Times of India

author: Reza Noorani
title: Look what's keeping Ravi Bhatia busy these days!
text:
Ravi Bhatia, who was last seen as Salim in Zee TV's 'Jodha Akbar' has been missing from the small screen for quite some time now.
When quizzed about what is keeping him busy these days? He said, "I'm reading a lot these days. Earlier, I used to get distracted while reading, but now I have become quite the bookworm lately."
About the books that keep him so hooked, he said "I recently finished Alchemist. It's an addictive novel and sometimes I literally forgot to eat while reading it.
READ: Ravi Bhatia to play Rajat Tokas's son in Jodha Akbar
Now I have started reading 'The Power of Your Subconscious Mind'. It's a must-read book for a person, like me, who believe in miracles."
The actor hardly attends any parties and prefer staying at home. "I'm not anti-social, but I love to spend time alone. I believe being a loner helps me to discover myself."
